reason: Plan designed with 29 atomic steps across 7 phases. Architecture decisions documented. Ready for Executor to begin implementation starting with Phase 1 project scaffolding.

phase_breakdown.Phase 1 - Project Scaffolding: 4 steps: directory structure, Cargo.toml, build.rs, hello-world verification
phase_breakdown.Phase 2 - Protocol & Message Types: 3 steps: serde types, NDJSON framing, unit tests
phase_breakdown.Phase 3 - TCP Server & Networking: 4 steps: listener, connection handler, heartbeat, lifecycle events
phase_breakdown.Phase 4 - CxxQt Bridge Layer: 5 steps: properties, signals, invokables, command queue, thread-safe wiring
phase_breakdown.Phase 5 - QML User Interface: 5 steps: main.qml, CommandCard, DeclineDialog, OutputView, styling
phase_breakdown.Phase 6 - Command Execution: 4 steps: process spawn, output streaming, completion handling, timeout
phase_breakdown.Phase 7 - Session & Packaging: 4 steps: session manager, CLI args, release build, README

key_decisions: Single TCP client model (one MCP server connection)
Command queue with JSON property for QML list rendering
Tokio runtime on background thread, Qt event loop on main thread
Shell dispatch for command execution (cmd /C / sh -c)
next_steps: Executor should start with Phase 1 and verify CxxQt compiles before proceeding
